EDDARD  The summons came in the hour before the dawn, when the world was still and grey.  Alyn shook him roughly from his dreams and Ned stumbled into the predawn chill, groggy from sleep, to find his horse saddled and the king already mounted. Robert wore thick brown gloves and a heavy fur cloak with a hood that covered his ears, and looked for all the world like a bear sitting a horse.  Up, Stark!  he roared.  Up, up!
